title: MORENA

lines.text: Você podia ter caprichado menos no beijo
lines.translation: You could have been less dramatic with the kiss.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Devia ter pegado leve na hora de amar
lines.translation: I should have taken it easy when it came to love.

lines.text: Podia ter falado não ao invés de aceito
lines.translation: I could have said no instead of accept.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Talvez a história da gente não 'tava onde tá
lines.translation: Perhaps our story wasn't where it is now.

lines.text: O que eu dei pra você?
lines.translation: What did I give you?
